channel.title: Bikes
channel.description:
I got the idea for this thread from [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,560993.0.html][b]Skateboarding l Post your deck[/b][/url]
Well, I don't know how many of you all ride, but I figured I would make a thread to post pics of your bikes. http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/145/40635827103420633212312.jpg/

item.title: Bikes
item.dc:creator: @ictbguud ictbguud
item.description:
@ictbguud wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:17, topic:459348”][quote author=ictbguud link=topic=562255.msg4102813#msg4102813 date=1347683067]

I don’t know if this is for Motorcycles or Dirt Bikes or Bmx Bikes… But I have a Eastern Warhammer and a Diamand Back Grind… (Bmx Bikes)…

BMX \m/ !!!

I have a fit eddie 1 2012 series

I used to BMX, I roller blade now ;P.
[/quote]
I used to rollerblade, I am really into skateboarding now. I could 360 and stuff off of crazy heights. haha

on topic, well for my dirtbike I have a yamaha 125 cc, it’s my baby.[/quote]

Nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Bikes
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

I’m getting the fiber glass forks for my redline. It’s my racing bike.

I will get tailwhips down, and when I do… I will catch it on video. That’s a promise.

Read full topic

item.title: Bikes
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:7, topic:459348”]I’m ordering fiber glass forks here in a few weeks.

I landed a ‘regular’ tail-whip once. I can’t seem to do it anymore though. I can do the basics though, such as 180 fakie and whatnot.[/quote]

lol fiber glass? Wonder if they’d put out with a beating and yeah I had tail whips solid then I lost them started smashing shins to much :s

Read full topic

item.title: Bikes
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:5, topic:459348”][quote author=Ares_ link=topic=562255.msg4100032#msg4100032 date=1347330581]
sick bike shame I don’t have my bike anymore :
[/quote]What kind of bike did you have?
P.S I can finally foot-jam tailwhip. #Winning.[/quote]

fly three amigos (frame)
odyssey (head set)
odyssey director forks
stolen convict (stem)
eastern wonder years (30" wide 9" rise)
profile ss cassette laced to animal rim (back wheel)
eastern sealed front rim (some random i got off a friend lol)
demolition crank (don’t remember the model older ones)

Also can you do regular tail whips?

Read full topic
